Pre-Game Insights: Armenia are ranked 97th in the world and have struggled recently, losing seven of their last nine games.
Latvia are ranked 137th and have not won their last eight away games.
Armenia have scored in 10 of their last 14 games, showing they can find the net.
Latvia have lost nine of their last 15 fixtures, including on penalties.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Armenia have a better recent goal-scoring record compared to Latvia.
Neither team has been strong recently, but Armenia have shown more ability to score.
Others: The match is part of the 2024-25 UEFA Nations League C campaign.
Armenia and Latvia are both in the same group of the league.
